title: Elements
desc:
- <:element:1107480918710571058> Cards must have at least one other color it can be played on.
- If you have 2 <:element:1107480918710571058> Cards, you may combine them into a new card, called a compound. As long as the compound consists of the elements that the 2 cards consist of, it can have any number of atom needed to make the compound (1 hydrogen and 1 oxygen is enough to combine into H2O.)
- Compounds can be played on any color that its components could be played on, including <:element:1107480918710571058> cards.
- Host must determine the effects of the new compound. Acidic compounds cause debuffs or drawing of cards. Basic compounds Buff or Discard your own cards. Neutral compounds are easy to play.
